title: Machine Learning-Enhanced TEM Image Analysis Techniques
content: In recent years, machine learning techniques have been effective in domain-specific tasks, particularly in the areas of materials and molecular discovery [1-3]. In this study, we explore how deep learning can be used to identify behaviors of interest in STEM imaging data. Specifically, we explore the use of variational autoencoder (VAE) to understand the identification of individual structural building blocks in complex data [3].
